comment: Amazing professor! Gives you great feedback on your papers so you know how to improve. If you don't want to put an effort into work, don't take her. She truly wants her students to do well; very approachable if you have questions/concerns. 4 papers, 10 weekly entries, one presentation. She made 1102 a good experience for me. Highly recommend her.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: Professor Bennett is an amazing professor; the specific grading criteria provide a sound basis for a successful essay. Even though grades are based on effort and class participation, the use of tools provided in class makes the difference in the grade that a stunt receives. Professor Bennett also provides a plethora of feedback through D2L.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria
